page.title: 05My Granda-his life. M.moor.
page.content: The tall figure of my daft granda can usually be found thundering about in the{greenhouse,}as he spends most of his time in there with his green tomato plants. When he is not admiring his great garden, he is {brewing}his poisonous beer or nodding off. When you say, "You're asleep again," he says, "I wasn't," even if he was snoring. He gets up at 5 o'clock, has the house cleaned from top to bottom by seven and, if you touch anything, he dusts again. His hair is white and going bald. He has brown eyes and is dark skinned.{His stained false teeth smile {at you whether they are in his mouth {or not!}Funny, hardworking and cheerful is my granda, and I love him.
